context_bundle.summary: System prompt design template: Role + Context + Objectives + Constraints + Output Format + Examples + Tone. Defines AI's behavior/persona. Be specific - more detail = better results. Use positive instructions, include few-shot examples for complex outputs.

onboarding.quick_start: System prompt = AI's identity + rules. Template: Role (who are you), Context (background), Objectives (goals 1-3), Constraints (boundaries), Output Format (structure), Examples (samples), Tone (style). Be specific, use positive framing, test systematically.
common_patterns: Role: You are an expert [domain] specializing in [area]
Constraints: Keep [x] under [y], Use [standard], Always include [z]
